title: AbstractWiki Architect Frame Schema: Entity – Sports team / club
description: Schema for the entity.sports_team frame: semantic representation of sports teams and clubs.

frame_type.description: Canonical frame type identifier for sports teams and clubs.

frame_family.description: Optional high-level family label; always entity for this frame.

main_entity.description: The team entity itself (e.g. FC Barcelona, New York Yankees).

sport.description: Lemma for the primary sport played by the team (e.g. football, basketball).

team_type.description: High-level type of team, e.g. club, national team, women's team.

home_location.description: Geographic home location of the team, typically a city or region.

home_venue.description: Primary stadium, arena, or ground where the team plays its home games.

country.description: Country entity associated with the team (for national teams or clubs strongly associated with one country).

leagues.description: Leagues or competitions the team participates in (past or present).

founding_event.description: Event describing the founding or establishment of the team.

dissolution_event.description: Event describing dissolution, relocation, or merger that ended the team’s existence, if applicable.

active_timespan.description: Coarse-grained timespan summarizing the period during which the team has been active.

colors.description: Primary team colors (surface forms, not language-specific morphology).

nicknames.description: Common nicknames for the team (e.g. The Reds).

current_manager.description: Current head coach or manager, where such a role exists.

current_captain.description: Current team captain, where such a role exists.

notable_players.description: Notable players historically associated with the team.

honours_events.description: Events representing important titles or honours, such as championship wins, cups, or major trophies.

attributes.description: Open-ended attribute map for additional team-specific information (e.g. founded_as, ownership_model, supporter_groups, rivalries).

extra.description: Opaque metadata bag for passing through source-specific structures (e.g. raw JSON, Wikidata statements).

entity.description: Generic entity reference (person, organization, place, etc.).

id.description: Local identifier for the entity, if any.

qid.description: External identifier such as a Wikidata QID.

kind.description: Optional kind label (e.g. person, organization, stadium).

extra.description: Arbitrary metadata attached to the entity.

location.description: Location reference (city, country, region, venue, etc.).

id.description: Local identifier for the location, if any.

kind.description: Optional kind label (e.g. city, country, stadium).

extra.description: Arbitrary metadata attached to the location.

timespan.description: Coarse time span with optional year, month, and day fields.

event.description: Generic event reference with type, time, location, and participants.

id.description: Local identifier for the event, if any.

event_type.description: High-level event type label (e.g. founding, title-win).

participants.description: Mapping from role label to entity participant.

extra.description: Arbitrary metadata attached to the event.
